/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided into two lanes by a white dashed line, is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day. A few cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, waiting for their owners to return. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are green, gray, and white, painting a typical day in the city of Beijing.
